summary: Completed comprehensive testing of user registration and login system. All backend APIs and frontend integration working perfectly.
passed_tests: POST /api/auth/register - User registration with all required fields
Duplicate userId validation - Returns proper error message
Duplicate email validation - Returns proper error message
POST /api/auth/user-login - User login with email and password
Wrong password validation - Returns proper error message
Non-existent email validation - Returns proper error message
Frontend registration page loads and functions correctly
Frontend login page loads and functions correctly
Registration form submission and database storage
Successful redirect to dashboard after registration/login
Arabic language support and UI rendering
